content:
RsaSecurityKey Class

In this Article

Represents a security key that is generated using the RSA algorithm. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class RsaSecurityKey : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • SecurityKey
  • System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey
  • RsaSecurityKey

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Constructors summary

RsaSecurityKey(RSA)

Initializes a new instance of the RsaSecurityKey class using the specified RSA algorithm.

Properties summary

KeySize

Gets the size, in bits, of the key.

Methods summary

DecryptKey(String,Byte[])

Decrypts the specified encrypted key.
EncryptKey(String,Byte[])

Encrypts the specified key using the specified algorithm.
GetAsymmetricAlgorithm(String,Boolean)

Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
GetHashAlgorithmForSignature(String)

Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
GetSignatureDeformatter(String)

Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
GetSignatureFormatter(String)

Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
HasPrivateKey()

Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.
IsAsymmetricAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
IsSupportedAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
IsSymmetricAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.

Constructors

  • RsaSecurityKey(RSA)

    Initializes a new instance of the RsaSecurityKey class using the specified RSA algorithm.

    public RsaSecurityKey (System.Security.Cryptography.RSA rsa);

    Parameters

    • rsa
      RSA

      An RSA that represents an RSA algorithm.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      rsa is null.

Properties

  • KeySize

    Gets the size, in bits, of the key.

    public override int KeySize { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The size, in bits, of the key.

    Remarks

    The RSACryptoServiceProvider supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.

Methods

  • DecryptKey(String,Byte[])

    Decrypts the specified encrypted key.

    public override byte[] DecryptKey (string algorithm, byte[] keyData);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The cryptographic algorithm that was used to encrypt the key. The supported algorithms are RsaV15KeyWrap and RsaOaepKeyWrap.

    • keyData
      Byte[]

      An array of Byte that contains the encrypted key.

    Returns

    • Byte[]

      An array of Byte that contains the decrypted key.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are RsaV15KeyWrap and RsaOaepKeyWrap.

    • ArgumentNullException

      keyData is null.

  • EncryptKey(String,Byte[])

    Encrypts the specified key using the specified algorithm.

    public override byte[] EncryptKey (string algorithm, byte[] keyData);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key with.

    • keyData
      Byte[]

      An array of Byte that contains the key.

    Returns

    • Byte[]

      An array of Byte that contains the encrypted key.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are RsaV15KeyWrap and RsaOaepKeyWrap.

    • ArgumentNullException

      keyData is null.

  • GetAsymmetricAlgorithm(String,Boolean)

    Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.

    public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm GetAsymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm, bool requiresPrivateKey);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The asymmetric algorithm to create.

    • requiresPrivateKey
      Boolean

      true when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • AsymmetricAlgorithm

      An AsymmetricAlgorithm that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      requiresPrivateKey is true and a private key is not available.

  • GetHashAlgorithmForSignature(String)

    Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.

    public override System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm GetHashAlgorithmForSignature (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The hash algorithm. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

    Returns

    • HashAlgorithm

      A HashAlgorithm that generates hashes for digital signatures.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

  • GetSignatureDeformatter(String)

    Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

    public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter GetSignatureDeformatter (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

    Returns

    • AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter

      An AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

  • GetSignatureFormatter(String)

    Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

    public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter GetSignatureFormatter (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

    Returns

    • AsymmetricSignatureFormatter

      An AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

    Exceptions

    • CryptographicException

      algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithm is RsaSha1Signature.

  • HasPrivateKey()

    Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.

    public override bool HasPrivateKey ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true when the private key is available; otherwise, false.

  • IsAsymmetricAlgorithm(String)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.

    public override bool IsAsymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The cryptographic algorithm.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true when the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys; otherwise, false.

  • IsSupportedAlgorithm(String)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.

    public override bool IsSupportedAlgorithm (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The cryptographic algorithm.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true when the specified algorithm is RsaV15KeyWrap, RsaOaepKeyWrap, or RsaSha1Signature; otherwise, false.

  • IsSymmetricAlgorithm(String)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.

    public override bool IsSymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The cryptographic algorithm.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true when the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys; otherwise, false.
